Detailed Description

template<typename Point, unsigned int Dim, typename NumType>
class sfcnn< Point, Dim, NumType >

Nearest Neighbor search class.

This class is a wrapper class for the sfcnn_work class. There are several template specializations for this class that select the appropriate seperated float type to be used for various floating point coordinate types.

Parameters:
Point Data type that stores user points
Dim Dimension of user points
NumType Data type that stores coordinates of user points

Member Function Documentation

template<typename Point , unsigned int Dim, typename NumType >
void sfcnn< Point, Dim, NumType >::ksearch ( Point  q,
unsigned int  k,
std::vector< long unsigned int > &  nn_idx,
std::vector< double > &  dist,
float  eps = 0 
) [inline]

Nearest Neighbor search function.

Searches for the k nearest neighbors to the point q. The answer vector returned will contain the indexes to the answer points. The distance vector contains the square distances to the answer points. This function is thread-safe.

Parameters:
q The query point
k The number of neighbors to return
nn_idx Answer vector
dist Distance vector
eps Error tolerence, default of 0.0.
